enhanced_by.reason: Setting the context is necessary to determine if the required properties have changed in a way that affects compatibility.
The old schema is required to compare with the new schema to determine changes in required properties.
The new schema is required to compare with the old schema to determine changes in required properties.
The core change status can be used to assert the overall compatibility of the schema after setting the required properties.
The list of changed elements can be used to assert specific changes related to required properties.
The overall change status can be used to assert if any changes, including required properties, have been made.
